about_the_game:
A single-player horror game with a variable storyline and multiple endings.

You are an employee of an agency dealing with the protection of various private properties. You are lucky enough to get a contract with one of the richest families in the world to guard one of the hundreds of mansions. Not only has no one lived here for several decades, but the site itself is in some kind of wilderness. In short, the job is calm and well paid. Nevertheless, sometimes the alarm still goes off, which makes you wake up and go to check. Usually, these are teenagers or all sorts of stray animals, but the last time looked strange from the very beginning ...

KEY FEATURES

Eerie atmosphere

No screamers around every turn and musicians sleeping on bass, just a truly eerie atmosphere of a half-abandoned estate.

Interactive story

Take the fate of your hero into your own hands and take him out of the current mess alive ... if possible ...

Extreme puzzles

Sometimes you have to make a choice in a split second. Let's see how you handle this.

Deep story

Fans of exploring the worlds of games down to the millimeter will be able to plunge into an intricate and fascinating story and reveal much more interesting details than with a quick passage.

short_description: One night, an alarm goes off in the old mansion of one of the richest families in the world. You, an employee of a security agency, go to find out the reason for this, but you quickly realize that everything is not as simple as it seemed at first.

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
